attributes.action: put an immediate halt to tax payers money being given to imams for free university education
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: why should one million pounds of tax payers money be given to imams to have free university education. My son would love to go to uni but we cannot afford it. He's a British subject, works and pays his taxes. This is pure racism and I thought this was against the law in our, sorry, no longer our country, but this country!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
